m_szDocTitle: Japan shares fall on earnings; Asia cautious ahead of central banks - MarketWatch
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Japan shares fall on earnings; Asia cautious ahead of central banks Published: Apr 27, 2016 5:42 a.m. ET Share By ChaoDeng Most stock markets in Asia Pacific fell Wednesday as investors braced for an update on monetary policy from the U.S. Federal Reserve. Australia’s S&P/ASX 200 XJO, +0.33%  was off 0.6% while both the Shanghai Composite SHCOMP, +0.01%  and Japan’s Nikkei Stock Average NIK, +0.68% fell by 0.4%. The Hang Seng Index HSI, +0.46%  finished down 0.2% and South Korea’s Kospi SEU, +0.42%  lost 0.2%. The Aussie dollar USDAUD, +0.7525%  slid on expecta
